alert.note: Alert for Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 2:44PM PST until March 09 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 2500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 2500 feet, heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory above 2500 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Trinity County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 4 AM to 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels are expected to rise this afternoon before falling again late tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
